about_the_game:
Diecast Car Shop Simulator

Are you ready to open and manage your dream diecast car shop? Diecast Car Shop Simulator offers an immersive experience designed for collectors and simulation enthusiasts. Build your shop from scratch, find the rarest diecast cars, add them to your collection, or sell them to your customers for profit!

Start Small and Grow Big

You begin with a small shop; only a few diecast car models are on your shelves, and your capital is limited. Over time, by making the right decisions, you can grow your business and make a name for yourself in the industry.

Hiring and Managing Staff

As your shop grows, things get more complex. At this point, you can hire staff to make your operations more efficient. You can hire a cashier or a warehouse manager to organize your stock.

Shelf and Product Variety

Make shelf arrangements and stock your shop with diecast cars of various scales and collector value. Organize your inventory based on your customers' needs and increase profitability by offering the best products!

Customer Satisfaction

Analyze your customers' needs and offer products that match their expectations. By satisfying them, you can gain more loyal customers and enhance your reputation.

Create Your Own Style

Customize the design of your shop and create your own brand.

Manage Your Target Market

Learn about your customers’ preferences and prepare stock that caters to their needs.

name: Diecast Car Shop Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Diecast Car Shop Simulator, open your own diecast car shop. Fill the shelves with the latest diecast cars, set your own prices, hire and manage staff, meet customer demands, and grow your shop to become the leading seller in the industry.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish
